issue.title: ru.scribd.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://ru.scribd.com/document/785450762/How-to-Setup-L2TP-IPSec-VPN-Servers-Debian-Electronic-Design](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fru.scribd.com%2Fdocument%2F785450762%2FHow-to-Setup-L2TP-IPSec-VPN-Servers-Debian-Electronic-Design) ### Comment > Статья описывает настройку сервера L2TP для линукс. > Несколько страниц отображаются нормально, но если прокрутить ниже, то текст размывается и написано "Пропустить рекламу", если нажать, то текст отображается. Если закрыть браузер с открытой страницей и потом открыть (так, чтобы восстанавливались вкладки открытые до закрытия, то возникает ошибка и предлагает выбрать, какой блокиратор я использую. ``` Username: @BlagoYar ``` ### Screenshots

comment.body: Детектор и ошибка отображаются не всегда, не пойму от чего зависит. Раз попробовал "Скачать PDF", вошёл в аккаунт, нажал "Загрузить" и потом вернулся назад по странице на статью и там была ошибка и детектор. Как-то рандомно.

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking)
 [http://kick.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fkick.com)
### Comment
> Whenever I have AdGuard DNS on, Kick app does not load the content. I have also tried it on my Mi Box (Android TV). It works on browser, though, so it seems to be something specific to the app.

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 3 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
> It's was a "backup" rule to fix adblock detection (in case if exception rule stop working), but now instead of boolean they use some hilarious text ¯\_(ツ)_/¯ (and as I can see, disabled rule breaks website now).
> 
> To trigger anti-adblock, you need to navigate to website with player (for example `https://cn.tingfm.com/#m=index&play=751`) and wait 1 hour, or use something like `localStorage.setItem('adblocked', Date.parse(new Date) / 1e3 - 3600)` (or just use `1` as a value) and reload website (it's fixed by current exception, so it's also necessary to block this request). It also depends on region, for users from China they do not show a player at all when adblock is detected, for other users they just show notice about blocked ads.
> 
> It should be fine with current exception, so I will remove this disabled rule.

Some hilarious text?

That's a sincere blessing for you, young man.
